itunes:title: Finding the Beauty in Unexpected Circumstances
title: Finding the Beauty in Unexpected Circumstances
description:
In this recorded talk Dr. Alexandra shares wisdom from Rumi, Petrarch, Nelson Mandela, positive psychology and more.    A special thank you to Mr. Gary Kitchell for his photo of the sunrise.  

Support the show

This show was created with love on my volunteer time. One small gift you can give me back is to take the time to leave the show a comment and rating on iTunes. You can also support the production costs of this show through buying me a coffee for $3 on buymeacoffee.com/dralexandra
content:encoded:
In this recorded talk Dr. Alexandra shares wisdom from Rumi, Petrarch, Nelson Mandela, positive psychology and more.    A special thank you to Mr. Gary Kitchell for his photo of the sunrise.

itunes:keywords: Petrarch, Rumi, Nelson Mandela, Prison, Martha Stewart, Walker Percy, Positive Psychology, Seligman
